Title: Relates to providing performance of duty disability retirement benefits for certain first responders in Nassau county
Summary: Relates to providing performance of duty disability retirement benefits for the employee titles police medic, police medic supervisor, police medic coordinator, bureau director emergency ambulance, and deputy bureau director emergency ambulance in the employ of Nassau county.
LawCode: Add ยง607-i, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing performance of duty disability retirement benefits for the employee titles police medic, police medic supervisor, police medic coordinator, bureau director emergency ambulance, and deputy bureau director emergency ambulance in the employ of Nassau county
